review: Love the Fire Stick.  Makes any TV a smart TV. "Death is but a door. Wonderfully convenient and resourceful tool.  Best purchase!
author: Mahmoud

review: It's wonderful as we don't have cable, but it is glitchy.
author: Taylar

review: Quick easy set up and simple to use
author: Amazon Customer "luvs 2 shop"

review: Love this thing!!!  Now I just have to replace all my Chromecast units with these.
author: Robert Aguirre

review: Very pleased with my purchase.  It is easy to setup and use.
author: SusanM

review: set up easily. does not interface with any apple products (ipad, iphone) so the ability to watch youtube, etc is pretty limited.  A big part of the draw was the ability to watch what was on the ipad on tv.. only works with their proprietary tablets
author: Gary Wahl
